glsa.title: Groff: Multiple Vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in Groff, allowing context-dependent attackers to conduct symlink attacks.

background.p: GNU Troff (Groff) is a text formatter used for man pages.

description.p: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in Groff. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.

impact.p: A context-dependent attacker could perform symlink attacks to overwrite arbitrary files with the privileges of the user running the application.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All Groff users should upgrade to the latest version:
